alert.note: Alert for West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 9:44AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. * WHERE...Essex, Bad Rock Canyon, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan Lake, Marias Pass, and Polebridge. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blizzard like conditions from blowing and drifting snow expected in Badrock Canyon along US Highway 2 Wednesday evening into Thursday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
